meeting_preferences.format: video only when deep discussion needed

work_habits.focus_time_requirements: 3‑4 hours of uninterrupted time per day

personality.collaboration_style: structured, values clear roles and responsibilities
personality.stress_management_approach: scheduled short breaks, daily 30‑minute run, mindfulness app
personality.conflict_resolution_style: collaborative problem solving with emphasis on facts

availability.other_commitments: Weekly QA community meetup (2 hrs), occasional evening childcare
availability.travel_flexibility: up to 5 days per quarter, prefers short trips

personal_factors.commute_situation: 30‑minute drive to office, occasional traffic delays
personal_factors.career_motivation: Aiming to become QA Lead within 2‑3 years; passionate about automation framework design

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: Twice‑weekly team sync + ad‑hoc as needed
collaboration.feedback_style: direct but courteous; prefers constructive specifics
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: Writes detailed test case docs in Confluence; runs monthly brown‑bag sessions on new tools

potential_bottlenecks: High reliance on manual regression during sprint peaks
Limited early‑morning availability due to childcare
risk_factors.backup_person_needed: Junior QA engineer (Ali Khan) for critical test runs
burnout_risk_factors: Meeting overload if not kept to short stand‑ups
